context: So why does the box say Internet connection required if the DLC is on the disc? Or is it only required for the Harley Quinn content?
response: DLC is already on the disc. You only connect to the internet if you want to play it online. Put the second disc in and download content.Play the game with the first disc. I dont have mt xbox connected to the internet and everything works great!

context: it didn't say about that how much Ram or vga  do I need on my pc
response: It only states that you will need 75gb for the entire scenery.

context: Can I use this code on my Xbox one and on our xbox 360 in the home or is it an either or code?
response: You put the code into your xbox 360 and when you get an xbox one it will show up in your library of games or as free to download from the xbox one game store.

context: Is this game 3rd person only?
response: Yes, random things where you take pictures, and can zoom a bit do camera is tighter, but predominantly third person

context: Does this bundle have the new high capacity GamePad battery that lasts up to 8 hours? Or, is it still the original one that one lasts 3 to 5 hours?
response: From my experience the battery does not last longer than 5 hours but it's a not a big deal for me because I don't play all day. You can buy 2 gamepads and always keep one charging if you wanna play all day.

context: Any download codes included with this game or is the entire experience in the cartridge?
response: As far as I remember, there were no codecs.

context: Does this work with the Xbox One? I bought the Chat adapter and I get game audio but no chat. I also updated the controller.
response: No just Xbox 360

context: Will this work on a tv that is mounted on the wall?
response: Yes.  As long as you have access to the top of the TV,  it will work.  You should note that the cable for the kinect has to be able to reach from the Xbox to the TV top,  so keep that in mind.

context: Do you need xbox live membership to play it on your own?  Like to play without xbox live.
response: Xbox live is only required if you want to play Multi player.

context: I know there is a second disc for the dlc's. Do I need to install the second disc and play them with the first disc?
response: Yes. The install takes roughly 20 minutes depending on your Xbox, but once the DLC's are installed you only need the first disc to play them. The second disk is simply for the system to copy the data over to the hard drive. One time deal and I believe usable with friends.

context: will it work on windows 8?
response: I haven't tried it on Windows 8, but the information on the case says it will run on XP, Vista, 7, and 8.

context: i am buying the deluxe set wiiu do i need a pro controller
response: it is not required for any game. however it is really comfortable, and really light. The battery also lasts about 80 hours between recharges. it really is a great controller, but i usually use the Gamepad.

response: Both yellow and grey thumbsticks are included.

context: Can you use this in a Wii?
response: The wii board works on the wii.The game disc included and the pedometer won't, as the disc is playable only on the wii u and the pedometer has to be synced with the wii u gamepads infrared scanner.

context: I am located in Egypt. I tried to purchase the membership on the PS4 but Egypt isn't listed in the country list. Is it gonna work if I purchase this?
response: I Suggest you to create a new PSN account, but instead of creating the account in Egipt, create it as a US account. this way you can get the best free games and you wont have any problem. in my case, I'm from Argentina, and my PSN Account is from the US

context: I havent played the prior Dead Rising's. Should I play them for any story knowledge or can I jump right into this game?
response: There are a few instances, especially at the end, where prior knowledge of the Dead Rising universe lore would be helpful for understanding the plot twists. However, you could still play the game and have a great time without prior knowledge of characters or meta plot.

context: will this controller work for games on steam
response: Yes, i use it for operating aircraft in all the Arma games

context: can you play this game solo?
response: My son plays it solo - he is 13.

context: I have a tv mounted above my fireplace. Is 7' off the ground too high for this sensor to be placed?
response: I highly doubt it. You can bend the kinect downward so that its looking down towards you.  If your that concerned about it have someone hold the kitchen on top of the TV and test it out before you buy it.

context: Does the game download from the disk to my PC, or do I have to use Steam? I wont use Steam on my computer.
response: I had some difficulty doing it because of bandwidth, but was able to download to my PC and play without using Steam.

context: Just out of curiosity, did Edward ever become an Bonafide(real) assassin or is he just wearing the hood?
response: He does indeed become an Assassin throughout the game he was just a pirate but he grows up and ends up living by a creed instead of living by his own selfish desires

context: I have a sealed copy of MLB 13 sitting next to me. Is it worth upgrading to MLB 14? I can't afford a PS4 now, so the PS3 version is my only option.
response: Personally, after playing 14, I am going back to 13.  It seems to me that the physics are a bit off and I don't like the new interface at all.  It is also harder to read everything.  13 used nice big, bold lettering, 14 not so much.

context: Do you need wifi to play?  I know you need it to download... But is it needed to actually play the games?
response: no. Just to download.

context: Will this work with the wireless version for windows?
response: It sure will. If you already own an Xbox 360 and the 360 controller (as it should have come with) then the cord will act as a charger and you'll also have an extra battery pack.

context: Are the cases cardboard or plastic?

context: does it work perfectly with xbox 360 controller do I have to do anything special and can I use it for a PS3 IPhone and PC??
response: It's perfect for 360, unfortunately I had to return it 13 days after I got it because it's very sensitive as far as the quality in the product itself. Ear piece broke off hinge. #MadeInChinaSmh. Otherwise I was thoroughly impressed with it.
